goal.en: “Course Overview: This course is designed for graduate students to provide an introduction to research methods in e-learning. In this course, we will discuss basic conception of educational research and e-learning. Also, important research methods frequently used in e-learning research (including qualitative, quantitative, and mixed research methods) will be introduced. Moreover, the students who take this course will learn about each step in the process of educational research in e-learning, including formulating research problem, literature review, generating research questions and hypotheses, research design, data collection and analyses, drawing findings and conclusions, and they are expected to complete a research proposal at the end of the semester.“

content.en:
“Course Overview:
This course is designed for graduate students to provide an introduction to research methods in e-learning. In this course, we will discuss basic conception of educational research and e-learning. Also, important research methods frequently used in e-learning research (including qualitative, quantitative, and mixed research methods) will be introduced. Moreover, the students who take this course will learn about each step in the process of educational research in e-learning, including formulating research problem, literature review, generating research questions and hypotheses, research design, data collection and analyses, drawing findings and conclusions, and they are expected to complete a research proposal at the end of the semester.
Course Objectives:
1. Gain an understanding of basic conception of educational research and e-learning.
2. Gain an understanding of the research methods frequently used in e-learning research.
3. Develop the ability to propose a research proposal in e-learning.
4. Develop basic skills to review a research paper and evaluate the quality of the research.
授課內容：
Week 1：課程介紹
Week 2：教育研究與數位學習研究的基本概念
Week 3：數位學習研究的模式與類別
Week 4：研究主題與其概念化
Week 5：理論與文獻探討
Week 6：研究問題的操作化
Week 7：研究群體與樣本選取
Week 8：描述性研究：調查研究法、發展研究法、相關研究法
Week 9：期中考週
Week 10：因果性研究：實驗研究法（一）
Week 11：因果性研究：實驗研究法（二）
Week 12：詮釋性研究：質性研究（一）
Week 13：詮釋性研究：質性研究（二）
Week 14：混合研究方法
Week 15：研究工具的發展與使用
Week 16：期刊論文基本評析與報告
Week 17：期末報告
Week 18：期末報告“

textbook.en: “Textbooks: 1.林生傳（2003）。教育研究法：全方位的統整與分析。台北：心理。 2. Ary, D., Jacobs, L. C., ＆ Sorensen, C. (2010). Introduction to research in education (8th ed.). Belmont, CA: Wadsworth, Cengage Learning. Suggested references: 1.王文科、王智弘（2009）。教育研究法（第13 版）。台北：五南圖書出版公司。 2.潘中道、胡龍騰譯（2010）。研究方法：步驟化學習指南（第2版）。台北：學富。 3.謝志偉、王慧玉譯（2010）。混合方法研究導論。台北：心理。“
